## Properties

| Property            | Attribute            | Description                      | Type                           | Default                               |
| ------------------- | -------------------- | -------------------------------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------------------- |
| `animationDuration` | `animation-duration` | Animation duration (ms)          | `number`                       | `1000`                                |
| `color`             | `color`              | Color (CSS color or theme color) | `string`                       | `'var(--erx-color-primary, #667eea)'` |
| `customSize`        | `custom-size`        | Custom size in pixels            | `number \| undefined`          | `undefined`                           |
| `indeterminate`     | `indeterminate`      | Indeterminate state              | `boolean`                      | `false`                               |
| `label`             | `label`              | Custom label                     | `string \| undefined`          | `undefined`                           |
| `max`               | `max`                | Maximum value                    | `number`                       | `100`                                 |
| `shouldAnimate`     | `should-animate`     | Animate on load                  | `boolean`                      | `true`                                |
| `showValue`         | `show-value`         | Show percentage text             | `boolean`                      | `true`                                |
| `size`              | `size`               | Circle size                      | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xl"` | `'md'`                                |
| `strokeWidth`       | `stroke-width`       | Stroke width                     | `number`                       | `8`                                   |
| `trackColor`        | `track-color`        | Track color                      | `string`                       | `'var(--erx-border-color, #e5e7eb)'`  |
| `value`             | `value`              | Progress value (0-100)           | `number`                       | `0`                                   |
